pages.title: Effects
pages.text: Add after any $(l:brewing/power)power$(/l) and $(l:brewing/duration)duration$(/l) boost or $(l:brewing/modifiers)modifiers$(/l). Ensure that the brew has enough $(l:brewing/capacity)capacity$(/l).$(p)Visit the main page of the Brewing section to explore Brew Effects

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: Add after any $(l:brewing/power)power$(/l) and $(l:brewing/duration)duration$(/l) boost or $(l:brewing/modifiers)modifiers$(/l). Ensure that the brew has enough $(l:brewing/capacity)capacity$(/l).
